metadata.subject: Re: Floor Statement of Senator Barack Obama on the Nomination of Alberto Gonzales for Attorney General - Wikisource, the free online library

relationships.description: Engaged in personal email correspondence discussing apartment lease and political matters
Employed by Latham which reimburses her apartment expenses

analysis.purpose: Coordinate meeting time and discuss personal apartment lease situation
analysis.significance: Shows personal relationship between high-profile lawyer and Jeffrey Epstein, including discussion of financial arrangements

notable_quotes: "I signed the lease in my name for a year, so I think I am pretty stuck. It is $11,000 a month and Latham reimburses me $8000 a month."
"He got 60. Rs controlled the Senate then."

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found in this communication

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced in this communication

public_knowledge.context: Kathy Ruemmler was White House Counsel under Obama; connection to Jeffrey Epstein would be of media interest

analysis.summary: Email exchange between Kathy Ruemmler and Jeffrey Epstein discussing meeting arrangements, Ruemmler's apartment lease situation where Latham reimburses $8,000 of her $11,000 monthly rent, and brief political commentary about Obama's Senate vote on Alberto Gonzales nomination.
